other_tests.findings: General condition improved after the lung transplantation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Oxygen saturation was 98% to 99% at room air in November 2008; serologic follow-up demonstrated HTLV-I infection acquisition.

other_tests.findings: Antibody titers: 256 times after 9 months, more than 8192 times in August 2006, 2048 times in April 2008.
